auviewer.project module¶

Class and related functionality for projects.

class auviewer.project.Project(projectModel, processNewFiles=True)¶

Bases: object

Represents an auviewer project.

The project name should also be the directory name in the projects directory.

createPatternSet(name, description=None, showByDefault=False)¶

Create and return a new pattern set. :return: a new PatternSet instance

Parameters

  • name (str) –

  • showByDefault (bool) –

Return type

auviewer.patternset.PatternSet

detectPatterns(type, series, thresholdlow, thresholdhigh, duration, persistence, maxgap, expected_frequency=0, min_density=0)¶

Run pattern detection on all files, and return a DataFrame of results. This DataFrame, or a subset thereof, can be passed into PatternSet.addPatterns() if desired.

getAnnotations(file_id=None, pattern_id=None, pattern_set_id=None, series=None, user_id=None)¶

Returns a dataframe of the annotations for this project, optionally matching specified criteria.

Parameters

  • file_id (Optional[Union[int, List[int]]]) –

  • pattern_id (Optional[Union[int, List[int]]]) –

  • pattern_set_id (Optional[Union[int, List[int]]]) –

  • series (Optional[Union[AnyStr, List]]) –

  • user_id (Optional[Union[int, List[int]]]) –

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame

getAnnotationsOutput(user_id)¶

Returns a list of user’s annotations for all files in the project

Parameters

user_id (int) –

getFile(id)¶

Returns the file with matching ID or None.

getInitialPayload(user_id)¶

Returns initial project payload data

getPatternSet(id)¶

Get project’s pattern set by ID. :return: the PatternSet instance belonging to the id, or None if not found

Return type

Optional[auviewer.patternset.PatternSet]

getPatternSets()¶

Get project’s pattern sets. :return: a dict of the project’s PatternSet instances, indexed by id

Return type

Dict[int, auviewer.patternset.PatternSet]

getTotalPatternCount()¶

Get total count of patterns in all the project’s pattern sets :return: number of patterns

Return type

int

listPatternSets()¶

Returns list of pattern sets (ID, names). :return: list of l:return:

Return type

List[List[str]]

loadPatternSets()¶

Load or reload the project’s pattern sets.

Return type

None

loadProjectFiles(processNewFiles=True)¶

Load or reload files belonging to the project, and process new files if desired.

setName(name)¶

Rename the project.
